DOC.brief_summary: The use of lasers in medicine in general, and diagnosis and treatment in ophthalmology in particular, increased significantly. Making retinal surgery using lasers have become increasingly common. The goal: to diagnose eye diseases safely
DOC.brief_title: Determination of Physical Parameters Relevant to Ophthalmic Lasers
DOC.criteria: Age 1840 years Refraction up to Â±0.25D, General good health Written informed consent to participate in the study. known current ophthalmic pathology known past ophthalmic pathology (including LASIK surgery) eye glasses or contact lenses
